entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
